long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TaskMaster Pro - Your All-in-One Task Manager

Boost your productivity with TaskMaster Pro, the ultimate Chrome extension designed to help you manage your tasks effortlessly. Perfect for busy professionals, students, and anyone looking to stay organized, TaskMaster Pro offers a range of powerful features:

Timer Integration: Set timers to keep track of your tasks and stay on schedule.

Date and Time Management: Easily add dates and times to your tasks. An expiry text will alert you when deadlines have passed, ensuring you never miss an important date.

Task Addition: Quickly add tasks and organize your to-do list.

Completion Toggle: Mark tasks as complete with a simple tick button, which conveniently converts into an undo button if you need to make changes.

Delete Functionality: Remove tasks with ease using the delete button, keeping your list clean and focused.

TaskMaster Pro is designed for simplicity and efficiency, providing you with all the tools you need to manage your tasks in one place. Download now and take control of your productivity!
